tool_description: Monitors conveyor belt speed in real-time by collecting data from speed sensors over a specified time period.

sensor_id.description: Unique identifier of the speed sensor to monitor

error_messages: Sensor not found: The specified sensor_id does not exist. Verify the sensor ID and ensure it is properly connected.
Invalid sampling interval: sampling_interval must be between 1 and 300 seconds. Use a reasonable interval based on system responsiveness needs.
Invalid duration: duration must be between 1 and 1440 minutes. Choose a duration appropriate for your monitoring requirements.
Sensor communication error: Unable to communicate with sensor. Check sensor connectivity and power status.
usage: Provide a valid sensor_id and optionally set sampling_interval and duration. The tool continuously collects speed measurements and returns timestamped data.

timestamps.description: Array of ISO 8601 formatted timestamps for each measurement

speeds.description: Array of speed measurements in meters per minute

average_speed.description: Average speed over the monitoring period in meters per minute
